text: 'SYSTEMATIC DESENSITIZATION - a behavior therapy technique that uses a gradual,step-by-step process to replace fear or anxiety with an incompatible response of relaxation and positive emotion - Anxiety and relaxation are competing responses, cannot feel both at the same time FLOODING - 2 behavior therapy technique in which a clent is exposed to a feared object or situation for prolonged period untl his or her ansiety extinguishes. - Uses cassicalconditioning principle of extinction (fear producing stimulus i presented until no longer paired with the conditioned response of fear) AVERSION THERAPY a behavior therapy technique in which a specific behavior is paired with an unpleasant stimulus in order to reduce its occurrence. ~Antabuse as an eample
